answers.answer: I hear a lot of girls trying castor oil.
Stimulate your breast it worked for me with my daughter. They were going to enduce me due to my preeclampsia,  but i wanted to have a natural birth.
Anything other than castor oil.  Don't feel like having the s! $*s
Cinnamon sticks in hot water.. see if your doctor.will strip your membranes ... but I'm curious why you'd want to.go Into labor if your husbands out of town????
That is the most effective way... other natural ways need to be started a few weeks before you want labor.. you can try primrose oil..
He works out of state right now so I will be with my bff. So he wouldn't be here anyway :(
Go for a walk it doesn't have to be very far, sex, hot showers (not too hot), even cleaning the house :)
